page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: Much of the area to the east of the reservoirs is given over to a variety of recreational activities. The headquarters of the{Scouting} movement are located at {Gilwell Park and this also forms a base for international jamborees and scout leader courses. Epping Forest is a popular venue for{ {horse-riding}and has a public{ {golf-course}at Chingford.The forest is also an area of scientific interest and attracts various naturalists.Most importantly it is a green open space on the edge of the city which provides easily accessible countryside for those living and working in the east end. Chingford{Sailing Club}is based on the southern half of the King George V Reservoir.
